## Current Research

### Violence Research

Investigating cognitive and social factors underlying interpersonal violence, with focus on prediction, prevention, and intervention strategies.

**Methods:** Ecological Momentary Assessment, longitudinal modeling, risk assessment validation

**Status:** Active - Data collection and analysis ongoing

[View project details](projects/violence/)

---

### Hallucinations Study

Examining perceptual and cognitive mechanisms of hallucinations across clinical and non-clinical populations. Exploring phenomenology, neural correlates, and assessment methods.

**Methods:** Phenomenological interviews, cognitive assessment, psychometric validation, experience sampling

**Status:** Active - Assessment development and validation phase

[View project details](projects/hallucinations/)

---

### Evaluation Methods

Developing and validating assessment tools for individual and team performance. Emphasis on ecologically valid measurement in applied settings.

**Methods:** EMA, text-based data collection, psychometric validation, team network analysis

**Status:** Active - Tool development and field testing

[View project details](projects/evaluation/)
